name: MyGuestHouse Accommodations
overview:
MGHworld.net - India’s leading Channel Manager & Hotel Management System.

MGHworld started in 2009 with 2 people & it has 120+ employees. MGHworld free technilogy to its user. Our users are Hoteliers, Travel Agents, Tour Operators & Corporate. MGHworld studies the in Indian Hospitality market there is a huge gap, which is that the budget segment isn’t available on online platform. So we analysed the issue & came up with an idea of providing free technology to our users & connect on Online platform.

Our products are:

  1. Hotel Management System
  2. Channel Manager
  3. Travel Agent Software

With our Hotel Management System you can manage your complete front desk activities in minutes.

With Our Channel Manager connects you with India’s leading online travel Websites, GDN & more than 12000 travel agents

Out Travel agent software completely transforms your travel agency to a OTA. With our system you can promote your self online.

More on our site www.mghworld.net
